org.apache.taverna.platform.run.api

Class RunProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.platform.run.api.RunProfile

  • public class RunProfile
extends Object
    A RunProfile specifies the parameters required to run a Workflow.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RunProfile(ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment, WorkflowBundle workflowBundle, Bundle dataBundle)
      Constructs a RunProfile that specifies the parameters required to run a Workflow.
      RunProfile(ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment, WorkflowBundle workflowBundle, String workflowName, String profileName, Bundle dataBundle)
      Constructs a RunProfile that specifies the parameters required to run a Workflow.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RunProfile

        public RunProfile(ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment,
                  WorkflowBundle workflowBundle,
                  Bundle dataBundle)
        Constructs a RunProfile that specifies the parameters required to run a Workflow. The main Workflow and Profile from the WorkflowBundle are used.
        Parameters:
        executionEnvironment - the ExecutionEnvironment used to execute the Workflow
        workflowBundle - the WorkflowBundle containing the Workflow to run
        dataBundle - the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow

      • RunProfile

        public RunProfile(ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment,
                  WorkflowBundle workflowBundle,
                  String workflowName,
                  String profileName,
                  Bundle dataBundle)
        Constructs a RunProfile that specifies the parameters required to run a Workflow.
        Parameters:
        executionEnvironment - the ExecutionEnvironment used to execute the Workflow
        workflowBundle - the WorkflowBundle containing the Workflow to run
        workflow - the Workflow to run. If null uses the main Workflow from the WorkflowBundle
        profile - the Profile to use when running the Workflow. If null uses the main Profile from the WorkflowBundle
        dataBundle - the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkflowBundle

        public WorkflowBundle getWorkflowBundle()
        Returns the WorkflowBundle.
        Returns:
        the WorkflowBundle

      • setWorkflowBundle

        public void setWorkflowBundle(WorkflowBundle workflowBundle)
        Sets the WorkflowBundle containing the Workflow to run.
        Parameters:
        workflowBundle - the WorkflowBundle containing the Workflow to run

      • getWorkflowName

        public String getWorkflowName()
        Returns the name of the Workflow to run. If no Workflow name is set the main Workflow from the WorkflowBundle will be run.
        Returns:
        the Workflow to run

      • setWorkflowName

        public void setWorkflowName(String workflowName)
        Sets the name of the Workflow to run. If no Workflow name is set the main Workflow from the WorkflowBundle will be run.
        Parameters:
        workflowName - the name of the Workflow to run

      • getProfileName

        public String getProfileName()
        Returns the name of the Profile to use when running the Workflow. If no Profile name is set the main Profile from the WorkflowBundle will be used.
        Returns:
        the Profile to use when running the Workflow

      • setProfileName

        public void setProfileName(String profileName)
        Sets the name of the Profile to use when running the Workflow.

        If no Profile name is set the main Profile from the WorkflowBundle will be used.

        Parameters:
        profileName - the name of the Profile to use when running the Workflow

      • getDataBundle

        public Bundle getDataBundle()
        Returns the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow.
        Returns:
        the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow

      • setDataBundle

        public void setDataBundle(Bundle dataBundle)
        Sets the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow.
        Parameters:
        dataBundle - the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow

      • getExecutionEnvironment

        public ExecutionEnvironment getExecutionEnvironment()
        Returns the ExecutionEnvironment used to execute the Workflow.
        Returns:
        the ExecutionEnvironment used to execute the Workflow

      • setExecutionEnvironment

        public void setExecutionEnvironment(ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment)
        Sets the ExecutionEnvironment used to execute the Workflow.
